price: Samuud, ummanni Luuxiifi warri bosonaas (sobsiisanii jiru) Isaan hunduu gareewwan (dhugaa irratti duulanii dha).
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
